mapper.select: select doc.id, doc.title, doc.body, doc.publish, doc.author, emp.name as authorName, doc.ts, emp.dept_name as deptName from doc left join ( select emp.id, emp.dept_id, dept.name dept_name, emp.name from emp left join dept ON emp.dept_id = dept.id ) emp on doc.author=emp.id order by doc.id desc

select c.id, c.author, d.name dept, e.name, c.title, c.publish, c.ts, case when s.n = 3 then 3 when s.x < 2 then 1 else 2 end stat from doc c, emp e, dept d, approval a, ( select min(stat) n, max(stat) x from approval, doc where doc_id = doc.id group by doc_id) s where e.dept_id = d.id and c.author = e.id and c.id = a.doc_id and (c.author = #{id} or a.approver = #{id} and 0 < a.stat or c.publish = true and s.n = 3) group by a.doc_id order by stat, c.id desc limit #{skip}, #{count}

select count(*) from doc c, emp e, dept d, approval a, ( select min(stat) n, max(stat) x from approval, doc where doc_id = doc.id group by doc_id) s where e.dept_id = d.id and c.author = e.id and c.id = a.doc_id and (c.author = #{id} or a.approver = #{id} and 0 < a.stat or c.publish = true and s.n = 3) group by a.doc_id

select z.lev1_dept, z.lev1_chief, e1.name lev1_name , z.lev2_dept, z.lev2_chief, e2.name lev2_name , z.lev3_dept, z.lev3_chief, e3.name lev3_name from( select t1.name as lev1_dept, t1.chief as lev1_chief , t2.name as lev2_dept, t2.chief as lev2_chief , t3.name as lev3_dept, t3.chief as lev3_chief from dept as t1 left join dept as t2 on t2.id = t1.up_id left join dept as t3 on t3.id = t2.up_id where t1.id = #{deptId} ) z left join emp e1 on z.lev1_chief=e1.id left join emp e2 on z.lev2_chief=e2.id left join emp e3 on z.lev3_chief=e3.id

select d.id as doc_id, d.title, d.author, emp.name as author_name, emp.dept_id, emp.dept_name as deptName, d.ts from doc d left join ( select emp.id, emp.dept_id, dept.name dept_name, emp.name from emp left join dept ON emp.dept_id = dept.id ) emp on d.author=emp.id where d.author = #{author} order by d.id desc

select a.doc_id, d.title, d.author, emp.name as authorName, emp.dept_id, emp.dept_name as deptName, a.stat, d.ts from approval a left join doc d on d.id = a.doc_id left join ( select emp.id, emp.dept_id, dept.name dept_name, emp.name from emp left join dept ON emp.dept_id = dept.id ) emp on d.author=emp.id where a.approver = #{approver} and a.stat = #{stat} order by a.doc_id desc
